title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document detailed requirements for the DataShield project. This includes specific data types (structured/unstructured), security policies (encryption, access controls, etc.), user roles (admin, standard, read-only), integration points with the data warehouse (SQL Server, PostgreSQL) and object storage (AWS S3, Google Cloud Storage), non-functional requirements such as performance, scalability, and availability, error handling, and logging mechanisms. Additionally, consider edge cases for data types, potential future integrations, and any other relevant system constraints. Update the documentation to reflect a comprehensive understanding of the project scope. Consider incorporating functional and non-functional requirements for edge scenarios, such as handling sensitive data in transit, exceptional access control needs, and exceptionally large volumes of data. Update the documentation to account for these additional considerations. If possible, provide initial wireframes or UX/UI design elements for the user interface.

title: Design System Architecture for DataShield Project
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components for data encryption/decryption (AES-256 or similar), access control (based on role-based or attribute-based access control models), integration with the data warehouse (SQL Server) and object storage (S3-compatible or Cloud Storage), as well as considerations for scalability, performance, and security best practices such as OWASP Top 10, PCI DSS compliance. The design should also outline how to handle data redacted due to legal or privacy reasons.

title: Implement Data Encryption and Decryption
description: Develop the core functionality for encrypting and decrypting sensitive data based on the defined security policies and user roles.

title: Implement Access Control and User Management
description: Develop the access control and user management components, including integration with the data warehouse for user roles and permissions.

title: Integrate with Object Storage
description: Implement the integration with the object storage system to retrieve and store encrypted data.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for displaying clear text data based on user permissions and roles.

title: Set up Testing and Deployment Infrastructure
description: Configure the testing and deployment environments, including continuous integration and delivery pipelines.

title: Conduct Security Audits
description: Perform regular security audits and penetration testing to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities.
dependencies: Implement Access Control and User Management

title: Write Documentation
description: Develop comprehensive documentation for the DataShield system, including user guides, technical documentation, and deployment instructions.

title: Perform Quality Assurance Testing
description: Conduct thorough quality assurance testing, including functional, integration, and performance testing, to ensure the system meets the defined requirements.
dependencies: Implement Access Control and User Management
